summary:
Molag Bal is the Daedric Prince of domination, vampirism and enslavement of mortals, so his mace should go accordingly to that!
This mod adds a slight increase on raw damage and changes the enchantment adding health draining on top of the usual effects.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center]If you like this mod please endorse it! :)

-Description-[/center][/size]

Molag Bal is the Daedric Prince of domination, vampirism and enslavement of mortals, so his mace should go accordingly to that!
This mod adds a slight increase on raw damage and changes the enchantment adding Â health draining on top of the usual effects for more vampiric flavour.

Obviously, overwrites the vanilla mace.

[size=4][center]-Compatibility-[/center][/size]
Sould be compatible with anything that doesn't alter the mace stats or enchantments.
author: Thanathoum
